header.who_we_are: DEXON Technology PLC is a leading technology company providing non-destructive testing, in-line inspection, and asset integrity management services globally. Located on Thailand’s eastern seaboard, DEXON’s headquarters houses over 400 personnel in addition to extensive testing and research development, and engineering facilities. Inspection tools are developed onsite from initial inspection technique research all the way through to testing and implementation.
